title: Unable to access dashboard
description: Customer reports that their dashboard loads infinitely after login.

title: Refund needed for duplicate charge
description: Customer was billed twice for the same subscription period.

title: 2FA code not delivered
description: Two-factor authentication codes are not being sent to user's phone.

title: Feature request: Multi-language support
description: Customer would like to use Customer Service Zone in Spanish.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Password reset link is not being sent despite multiple attempts.

title: Ticket history not showing
description: Customer's previous tickets do not appear on their profile.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Notifications for ticket updates arrive several hours late.

title: Incorrect customer profile details
description: Profile fields update incorrectly when saving changes.

title: Live chat not loading
description: Live support chat does not appear on the screen for the customer.

title: Slow loading times
description: Website takes too long to load ticket details.

title: Cannot submit new ticket
description: Customer gets an error message when submitting a new ticket.

title: Wrong file type error
description: Customer cannot upload JPG files even though the type is supported.

title: Monthly invoice missing
description: Customer did not receive their January invoice.

title: Attachments not visible
description: Uploaded attachments do not appear in the ticket view.

title: Account suspended unexpectedly
description: Customer reports their account was suspended without notification.
